content.rendered:
RAISING THE BENCHMARK FOR APARTMENT LIVING IN THE SOMERSET WEST AREA

Bahari Lifestyle Apartments is conveniently located in Somerset West, which is right in the heart of the Cape Winelands; a mere half-an-hour drive along the N2 from Cape Town. Here, it’s in close proximity to retail nodes, corporate parks and many different educational facilities.

Designed to be more spacious than other apartment developments in the area, Bahari Lifestyle Apartments boasts stunning fittings and finishes along with solar backup and a gas hob, keeping your lights on even during scheduled loadshedding. 

The carefree lifestyle is enhanced by the secure gatehouse that is manned 24/7 by highly trained, friendly security guards. The modern clubhouse has a swimming pool, double-storey gym and a laundry.

Contact Lerato
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
ESTATE VIDEO
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

3-Bed, 2-bed and two x 1-bed apartments for rent
Sizes range from 32m² – 80m²
Rent from R6,700pm – R13,300pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in this area
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults
Solar backup and Gas Hob

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails
Children’s Play Park
Braai Facilities
Swimming Pool
Splash Park

INDOOR FACILITIES

Clubhouse with Communal Lounge
Double-storey Gym (FREE Weekly Classes)
Meeting Room

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

BAHARI IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
